TextBlock.Text: <Color=#00ffbc>emerging error fuel unstable fuel seed jetissoned as far as able pressure mounting leak detected deploying liquid to conteract affected communication found downloading translation mimicing medium deploying caution</Color>

<Color=#00ffbc>i plea that this message reaches you in time the fuel contained within this seed is highly dangerous and contact with it is certain to end in your demise you must rapidly locate to a safe distance your continued survival depends on it</Color>
<Color=#00ffbc>seed breach forming fuel rapidly dispersed life signs dwindling as stars at the end of a universe</Color>
